meta.title: Paradox Decision Canvas - Interactive Tool | Global Governance Frameworks
meta.description: Break gridlock with the Paradox Decision Canvas - a practical tool for finding breakthrough solutions to complex problems.

header.title: Paradox Decision Canvas
header.subtitle: Transform either/or conflicts into both/and solutions
header.description: A step-by-step tool to help you break gridlock and find breakthrough solutions to your toughest problems.

mapPoles.title: Map the Poles
mapPoles.description: Identify the competing positions and their core values.

coreParadox.label: Core Paradox/Tension:
coreParadox.placeholder: Describe the fundamental tension (e.g., 'Need for security vs. need for privacy')

sharedAim.title: Find Shared Aim
sharedAim.description: What deeper goal do both sides actually want?
sharedAim.label: Shared Deeper Goal:
sharedAim.placeholder: What do both sides ultimately care about?

helpTips.tip1: Look beyond stated positions to underlying values
helpTips.tip2: Ask: What would success look like for everyone?
helpTips.tip3: Consider long-term outcomes both sides want

thirdWay.title: Third Way
thirdWay.description: Design a solution that serves the shared aim while addressing both poles.
thirdWay.label: Third Way Solution:
thirdWay.placeholder: A creative solution that honors both perspectives

helpTips.tip2: Look for solutions that make the old fight obsolete
helpTips.tip3: Consider how to sequence or layer different approaches

powerProof.title: Power-Proof
powerProof.description: Ensure your solution can withstand real-world power dynamics.

powerChecks.label: Power Analysis:
powerChecks.placeholder: Who could block this? How does it shift power?

safeguards.label: Safeguards:
safeguards.placeholder: What protections are needed for vulnerable groups?

helpTips.tip1: Identify who has veto power over implementation
helpTips.tip2: Consider how your solution affects existing power structures
helpTips.tip3: Build in protections for those with less power
